hackathon-description-text: Presenting sponsor of the Hackathon, General Assembly will organize and host a one-day marathon, "Daily Disruption" - join developers and hackers for an all-day frenzy of fun, camaraderie, and coding.  At the end, each team will have created a entirely new application that they will showcase to a panel of judges in the hopes of being crowned the winners!
hackathon-eligibility: Teams can consists of only on person but not more than five.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Two American Airlines flights anywhere in the US and 5 Summit Passes from Techweek.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=902 Broadway, New York, NY 10010, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: You are not required to explain how your app makes money, unless that is part of the problem you solve.

hackathon-description-header: Join us at General Assembly East for the "Daily Disruption" Hackathon
